channel.title: Reflection
channel.description:
Am I limited at all as to what I can do to a client using reflection? I mean like am I able to do the same as I'd be able to with java files?
Can someone give me an example of how I'd do something simple like change the text colour of the client? I know how to get fields and methods, but I don't see how I'd change it.

item.title: Reflection
